Description.Text: Black Tulip Hotel is a stylish 4-star property offering elegant accommodation near the heart of Dej. Highlights include a gym, international restaurant, bar, free Wi-Fi and free parking. Dej is a small city situated on the intersection of the Somesul Mic River and the Somesul Mare River. Originally a salt mining town, it is notable for its turbulent political history. Nearby places of interest include the 15th-century Hungarian Reformed Church, Unirea Stadium and the Ocna Dej salt mine. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Dej destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with a minimalist facade. Facilities include a gym and a playground. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in an elegant style with plain or patterned wallpaper, rich red or green tones and dark wood furniture. They feature a small sitting area with two armchairs. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, safe, mini-bar, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Despre offers national and international cuisine in a modern dining room. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar, which boasts a terrace. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
